Rulings.HAT:
● You can only "use" one of these effects per turn.
This means that, even if the activation or effect of one of these effects was negated, you still can't activate any of the others that turn.

PSCT.Vegas:
① You can banish 2 other monsters (WATERs and/or Dragons) from your hand and/or GY; 
Special Summon this card from your hand/GY. 
② During your opponent's End Phase, if this card was Special Summoned: Return it to the hand. 
③ If this card is banished: You can add 1 WATER Dragon from your Deck to your hand. 
④ You can discard this card and 1 WATER to the GY; send 1 monster from your Deck to the GY.
(You can only use 1 "Tidal, Dragon Ruler of Waterfalls" effect per turn, and only once that turn).
